message.content: lets save this on my git repository https://github.com/CaptainRandom00/Claude-Code.git

content.text: I'll help you save your current directory to that Git repository. Let me first check the current state of the directory and then set up the Git repository.

input.command: git status 2>&1 || echo "Not a git repository"
